title: Skeleton remains confirmed to be missing Kentucky teen Paige Johnson
itunes:title: Skeleton remains confirmed to be missing Kentucky teen Paige Johnson
description:
A hunter contacts police reporting human remains in a forest. Now, police say they have recovered the remains of Paige Johnson, who went missing nearly 10 years ago. Just 17 years old at the time, the Northern Kentucky girl disappeared after attending a party with friends.

Joining Nancy Grace to discuss the break in the case:

  • Kirk Nurmi - Former attorney for Jodi Arias, author of "Trapped with Ms. Arias" 
  • Bobby Chacon - Former Special Agent FBI, current star of Facebook series, "Curse of Akakor" 
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Forensic expert, Professor of Forensics, author of "Blood Beneath my Feet"
  • Dr. Daniel Bober - Forensic psychiatrist 
  • Kristen Quon - Reporter for WCYB, Bristol, Va.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
